venue.name: Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation

item.description:
Jules Verne meets modern technology during the New England Steampunk Festival at the Charles River Museum of Industry & Innovation in Waltham, MA. On May 7 and 8 2011 from 10 am to 4 pm, visitors enjoy hands on activities, interactive exhibits, vendors, live music and more at this festival celebrating everything steampunk. A sci-fi subculture, steampunk offers a fresh, romanticized view of modern technology by mixing it with Edwardian design.

>>> Here's a map showing parking off of Pine St and Crescent St just off of Moody Street <<<

>>> here's a map closeup of Landry Park, just next to the museum <<<

MEETING PLACE SUGGESTION: inside Landry Park, close to the fish ladder near the dam/waterfall.

A Festival For the Jules Vern Inside You!!!
item.name: Steampunk Festival in Waltham - May 7, 10-4
